solutionsBlurb: Built in public and all open-source, MikanDev Solutions is a collection of services and tools that are designed to make your life easier.
MDAccBlurb: A single account to access all MikanDev services.
NicoDLBlurb: Download videos from Nico Nico Douga with ease.
shortflareBlurb: Shorten and track URLs on your domain for completely free with your Cloudflare account
imagesBlurb: Resize, optimize, and deliver your images to the world with our global CDN.
xfixerBlurb: A Discord bot that fixes embeds for X (Twitter) links.
mikanbotBlurb: The opensource Discord bot that does a little bit of everything.
